channel.title: Controller Object disappeared
channel.description:
Hi guys,
For no particular reason, the Controller Object defined in my Preferences is now blank.
I remember I struggled a bit on this one. I did finally found a pretty solid patch to manage Program Change for switching between patches back in the days (maybe in Factory patches?). But now It has gone. I can't find anything related to Controller Objects.
Help would be appreciated. Thanks

item.title: Controller Object disappeared
item.dc:creator: @Yot
